> <OLD>
>
> WHEELIE shook his head, "I'm told that CYCLONUS was here, but if he's around
> I haven't seen him near.  Neither him nor Scourge are about, they seem to be
> doing without."
>
> Sighing, and elaborating, "As for what's up wtih GRIMLOCK, I don't think any
> can say or say not.  HE and the rest of his DINOBOTS are about, but no one
> knows for sure or without.  They seem to be smashing around, driving
> everyone into the ground.  They say there's some sort of prison ship, under
> attack by someone named MAGMATRON and SABERBACK after a clip.  I'm not sure
> what's going on, but something is heavily wrong.  GRIMLOCK is after other
> MAXIMALS, and something pains me to say so, but he seems enraged from the
> get-go.  Within this area of land, we are cut off and must make a stand.
> And you are in no way ready to go, so we must say here for now and we both
> know."

<NEW>

With a calm expression RODIMUS watched WHEELIE carefully as he talked,
taking in the information. Finally he nodded, "The prison ship I knew
of." He said as he looked around as if trying to put order to the
chaos of congealing thoughts in his head.

With a smooth motion he rose to his feet, his optics brightening as if
he had half expected to stumble and fall. "The prison ship fell some
time ago, releasing prisoners." RODIMUS said as he stood and walked a
pace or two as if testing himself. "But it was not near the area of
this jungle." His voice was that of a commander again, one of
confidence and authority.

He turned to look at WHEELIE, "But why in the world would Grimlock be
. . . " He paused, "Could the rumors be true?"

(TAG)

Preston
